p: No FCB were detected in output water under PC ( Fig 4). In contrast, FCB was detected in output water from all three STA types under CC, with maximum concentrations of 17, 6, and 20 CFU 100 mL -1 for P&S, SND and GEO, respectively. Median output water concentrations were 0.0 CFU 100 mL -1 for P&S and GEO, and 0.1 CFU 100 mL -1 for SND. Differences were not statistically significant between climate conditions (p = 0.106) or among STA types (p = 0.696). The presence of FCB in output water was more variable under CC for all STA types, with greater variability observed in SND and GEO ( Fig 4).
